author: chops

changelog.release_notes:

reverted to hourly image changes.  forgot to change back after testing.

description:
jul 15:
refreshed most images/themes
battery only shows if below 40%
slightly modified layout to see more of each image
option to hide weather info
-----

The layout here is very simple - just a number of images randomly updating each minute in the background.

The simple design is taken from my Sentri clock - another successful kickstarter project.

The watchface displays,
battery 
time - 12/24 hr modes
seconds (optional - displays to the right of the time)
temperature, c/f (far left) - updates hourly
weather icon (middle)
humidity percentage (far right)
day/date/month 

All images have been individually optimised for each watch.  They all just started out as free HD wallpaper downloads.

When you lose BT connectivity there is an option to vibrate.

There are 4 picture themes to choose from - landmarks, Space/Star Wars, Cats 'n dogs, people.

To see or force change to a new image it's easiest to just re-apply the settings. If no weather is received/available,  it defaults to the space theme.  If this is the case, hide the 3 circles!

NOTES: I am not skilled enough to do personal image uploading (as other watchfaces have done in the past), and I do not intend going there.  If you know how and desperately want to add it, feel free to contact me.

Also, you may notice it takes longer to load this watchface - that's because I've pretty much exhausted the resource limit.  Please make sure your BT connection and /or WiFi remain stable during loading, otherwise it may fail.  If it does, just try again, it'll work!
title: Themes
